Title: Rocket Riot Style Destructible Environment
Description:
This project aims to create the destructible environment used by the game Rocket Riot (available for Xbox 360 and Windows Phone 7).

This project was create using the XNA 4.0, the c# programming language and the Visual Studio IDE.
